detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This course is part of the Coordinated Arts Program, Political Science, Philosophy and  Economics stream, https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/streams/political-science-philosophy-economics-ppe/. Students must register in both Term 1 and Term 2 courses in CAP. 
 
Follow the prompts to register in all stream seminars (1), lectures (2), and tutorials (1-2)  
each term. 
 
For step-by-step instructions, please visit: https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/program/registration/ 
 
If you encounter any issues with registration into CAP, please contact us at support.fyip@ubc.ca

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This course is part of the Coordinated Arts Program, Environment & Society stream, https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/streams/environment-society/. Students must register in both Term 1 and Term 2 courses in CAP. 
 
Please register in both the lecture, and one of the following discussion sections: POLI_V 100-LX1, POLI_V 100-LX2, POLI_V 100-LX4, POLI_V 100-LX5, or POLI_V 100-LX6. This course is also clustered with ENST_V 211-199, and the Environment & Society sections of the CAP_V 100 stream seminar. ENST_V 211-199, and CAP_V 100 do not have discussion sections. For the CAP_V 100 stream seminar, please pick one of the following: CAP_V 100-E02, CAP_V 100-E03, or CAP_V 100-E04. Follow the prompts to register in all stream seminars (1), lectures (2), and tutorials (1-2) each term. 
 
For step-by-step instructions, please visit: https://cap.arts.ubc.ca/program/registration/ 
 
If you encounter any issues with registration into CAP, please contact us at support.fyip@ubc.ca

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
